GetSummaryData.summary: Queries the summary data of carbon emissions.

schema.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss format. Example: 2023-01-01 00:00:00.
The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss format. Example: 2023-02-01 23:59:59.

The statistical dimension. A value of productCode specifies that statistics are collected based on cloud service. A value of region specifies that statistics are collected based on region. A value of subUid specifies that statistics are collected based on Resource Access Management (RAM) user. If you do not specify this parameter, statistics are collected based on Alibaba Cloud account.
The list of Alibaba Cloud account IDs whose data needs to be queried.(used after enabling multi-account management).

ThisMonthConsumptionConversion.description: The carbon emissions in this month, in kgCO₂e.

LastMonthConsumptionConversion.description: The carbon emissions in the previous month, in kgCO₂e.

ThisYearConsumptionConversion.description: The carbon emissions in the year of this month, in kgCO₂e.

LastYearConsumptionConversion.description: The carbon emissions in the same month of the previous year, in kgCO₂e.

LastYearConsumptionConversionSum.description: The carbon emissions of the previous year, in kgCO₂e.

LatestDataTime.description: The point in time at which the data is last updated.

TotalCarbonConsumptionConversion.description: The total carbon emissions within the specified time range, in kgCO₂e.

GetSummaryData.title: GetSummaryData

QueryCarbonTrack.summary: Queries the carbon footprint of a cloud service.

schema.title: startTime
schema.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss format. Example: 2023-01-01 00:00:00.

schema.title: endTime
schema.description: The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss format. Example: 2023-02-01 23:59:59.

The statistical dimension. A value of productCode specifies that statistics are collected based on cloud service. A value of region specifies that statistics are collected based on region. A value of subUid specifies that statistics are collected based on Resource Access Management (RAM) user. If you do not specify this parameter, statistics are collected based on Alibaba Cloud account.
The list of Alibaba Cloud account IDs whose data needs to be queried.(used after enabling multi-account management).
Whether to count the carbon emission details of multiple accounts. You can pass it in after opening the multi-account management. The default value and 0 is No and 1 is Yes.
After sorting in reverse order according to the data value of the return value, only the first TopNum data will be returned. If no data is passed, all data will be returned by default.

Whether the return result uses code as the identifier(0 meas not used and 1 means used). If not passed, the default code is used.

For example, when the return result is to summarize carbon emissions according to the cloud product dimension, the identifier of ECS is "ecs" when 0 is passed, and "Elastic Compute Service" when 1 is passed.

Uid.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account.

SubUid.description: The ID of the RAM user.

Region.description: The region in which the cloud service resides.

QuotaValue.description: The carbon emissions within the specified time range, in kgCO₂e.

StatisticsDate.description: The date when the statistics are collected, which is a timestamp in milliseconds.

QueryCarbonTrack.title: QueryCarbonTrack

Verify.summary: Verifies whether Alibaba Cloud accounts have the required permissions.

AllowedUids.description: The IDs of the returned Alibaba Cloud accounts that have the required permissions.

items.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account that has the required permissions.

accountType.description: Resource directory account type. 0: not connected, 1: RD member account, 2: RD delegated administrator, 3: RD master administrator

multiAccountsAllow.description: Whether multi-account management is enabled for the current Alibaba Cloud account. 0:no, 1:yes

allMultiAccountUids.description: A list of all Alibaba Cloud accounts in the resource directory that you have permission to view (returned only when multi-account management is enabled).

accountId.description: The ID of Alibaba Cloud account.

displayName.description: The username of Alibaba Cloud account.

Verify.title: Verify

QueryMultiAccountCarbonTrack.summary: 获取多账号碳足迹明细数据
